<Text: Bubi people:  The indigenous Bubi of Bioko Island have since been outnumbered—first by non-indigenous Krio Fernandinos; and then by members of the Fang ethnic group, who have immigrated in large numbers from Río Muni.>

<Text: Bubi people:  Once numbering over 3 million, the Bubi currently number less than 100,000 worldwide.>
